ThingDef.label: bloodwyrm
ThingDef.description: The lithe and vicious bloodwyrm has a penchant for carnage.

li.label: Fire Breath
li.description: A large fire breath that scorches the earth and everything else.

li.label: Dragon Spit
li.description: Spit a ball of fire onto your foes
